trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around May 11th 2010
Summary: Two bright red objects appeared vertically parralell to eachother over Windsor CO.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my house in Windsor getting a glass of milk when something caught my eye outside of the window, It was a bright red light at least 400-500 ft above the ground, as I investigated another bright red light appeared below it. My first reaction was a cell phone tower but there isn't any in that particular direction nor anywhere in close proximity to my house. I started watching these objects 2 hours ago and they haven't moved since the second red orb appeared below it. What was so interesting to me was the fact that it is snowing very hard and the visibility is very low. Now how in the world would I be able to make out two giant red orbs in the sky miles away from my house?? Beats me.
